survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on current corporate sustainability initiatives to understand their effectiveness and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure familiarity levels.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice checkbox options with an 'Other' field for open-ended responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the company's current sustainability efforts?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the company's current sustainability efforts?

questions.question_text: What motivates you to participate in sustainability initiatives at work?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What motivates you to participate in sustainability initiatives at work?

questions.question_text: Which sustainability initiatives would you like to see the company adopt in the future? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with a limit of 3 selections and an 'Other' field.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with a max selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: Which sustainability initiatives would you like to see the company adopt in the future? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in sustainability programs offered by the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure participation.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in sustainability programs offered by the company?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more in sustainability initiatives? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Occasionally', 'Rarely', or 'Never' in Q6
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with conditional routing based on Q6 responses.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more in sustainability initiatives? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Occasionally', 'Rarely', or 'Never' in Q6

questions.question_text: Do you feel that the company's sustainability efforts align with your personal values?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for agreement levels.

script.question_text: Do you feel that the company's sustainability efforts align with your personal values?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve the company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve the company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in joining a sustainability committee or task force at your company?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge interest.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in joining a sustainability committee or task force at your company?
